name: 2 more weeks
lyrics:
作词 : Gareth.T
作曲 : Gareth.T
No fash no fash
不用着急
Take your time waking up
慢慢醒来
I'll stay I'll stay up on my phone
从醒来就盯着我的手机
Sure I miss you like you do
在想你
Seeing you is overdue
相见恨晚
I got my ticket home Im coming back to you
等我回去了就能找你见面
Just 2 more weeks till I'll be home with you
再过两周我就能回家陪你了
And although It feels forever
一日不见如隔三秋
Know the time zones and the distances make it hard
时差和距离总是让异地恋变得更难
But in my mind I picture
我脑海里描绘着与你相见那一天
You in that sundress and it'll all be worth the while
你穿着的是裙子 如此耀眼的你
Waking up on u it'll all be worth the while
与你一起醒来 世间也不过如此
That why I cant wait to see yo face again
这就是为什么我迫不及待地想再次见到你
I cant let a good thing slide and pile up my regrets
不会再错过了 我会抓住这些美好
You the best thing in my life ya its ma job to hold you tight imma hold on you so so tight
我唯一的任务就是紧紧地抱着我生命中最美好的你
I cant wait to see you face to face
我已经迫不及待地想见你了
Turn netflix party to netflix and chill all night
想和你看整晚整晚的网飞
You cuddle by my side
你依偎在我的身边
Pillow talk till the sun rises
彻夜聊天 枕边有你
Im counting down the days to that loving in real life
我在倒数着和你见面的日子
Counting down the days till I could look you in the eye feel your body next to mine
一天又一天地数着日子 直到我能看着你的眼睛感觉到你在我身边
And although It feels forever
一日不见如隔三秋
Know the time zones and the distances make it hard
时差和距离总是让异地恋变得更难
But in my mind I picture
我脑海里描绘着与你相见那一天
You in that sundress and it'll all be worth the while
你穿着的是裙子 如此耀眼的你
I know it'll worth the while
一切如此美好
I give it all up baby just to see you smile
我放弃一切 只为见你的一面
You be lightening up my day just with yo texts
你的短信就是给我最大的安慰
Zoom calling everyday like this shit business
每天用zoom打视频电话
I wish this 15 hundred mile could just go missing
这2400公里能不能快点消失啊
And I could kiss you right about now F'in these texts
我想就亲在你脸上而不是短信里发个mua
Seeing pics from last year
看了去年的照片
Got me in my feelings
想起过往的情感
Got me reminiscing bout you
想起了你
Got me high key missing
我的情绪也因此跌宕
Stay up till the morning for you
为你彻夜不眠
And although It feels forever
一日不见如隔三秋
Know the time zones and the distances make it hard
时差和距离总是让异地恋变得更难
But in my mind I picture
我脑海里描绘着与你相见那一天
You in that sundress and it'll all be worth the while
你穿着的是裙子 如此耀眼的你
Waking up on u it'll all be worth the while
与你一起醒来 世间也不过如此
收起
